# Low-Back-Diagnosis

Low Back Diagnosis - PH846

## Requirements

[Docker](https://docs.docker.com/install/) and [CWLTool](https://github.com/common-workflow-language/cwltool#install)

## Configuration

Specify input dataset path in [Low-Back-Diagnosis-inputs.yml](Low-Back-Diagnosis-inputs.yml).

## Usage

Run: `cwltool Low-Back-Diagnosis.cwl Low-Back-Diagnosis-inputs.yml`
